channel.title: Running my server puts my CPU usage at 100%
channel.description:
Which means i can't actually play it, seeings as it freezes every time I run it and the SilabSoft client together.
My other servers work fine though, whats wrong with this one?
Its smaller than my other servers that work perfectly but the CPU usage is always higher, can anyone help?
I'm slightly baffled :confused:
It was working fine yesterday, although i didn't check to see if the CPU usage was as high then as it is now, but it was still working.
Help me and I'll love you forever :D

item.title: Running my server puts my CPU usage at 100%
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Man_Joe6 Mad Man Joe6
item.description:
@Mad_Man_Joe6 wrote:

No need for the caps.

Thanks anyway, was just clinging to some futile hope that i could make it work again.

Thing is, it worked yesterday… Thats what made me think it could work again.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2008, 10:00:03 AM[/size][hr]Does anyone know WHY it was working yesterday but not today?

I didn’t code anything new into it, or change anything on my computer, yet it changed anyway.

Read full topic
